name: FamilyWatchNight
description: Cross-platform desktop application to bring fun and safety to family movie nights.

scripts.build:main:raw: node scripts/copy-migrations.js && node scripts/generate-app-info.js && tsc -p tsconfig.main.json
scripts.build:main:watch: node scripts/copy-migrations.js && node scripts/generate-app-info.js && node scripts/copy-migrations.js && tsc -p tsconfig.main.json --watch
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:features
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:main:for-integration-testing && cross-env NODE_ENV=test playwright test
scripts.test:features: npm run build:main:for-integration-testing && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cucumber-js
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer && electron-builder
scripts.pack: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer && electron-builder --dir
